title: Dream of owning a flying car ? This California company is already selling them
description: Pivotal is a Palo Alto-based company developing an ultralight, electric aircraft for recreational use and short-haul travel.

# Dream of owning a flying car? This California company is already selling them

The Pivotal BlackFly takes off near Watsonville, Calif.
